summary: Includes 3 Presets. One Altmer, one Dunmer and one Bosmer. Adden an Orsimer.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ffffff]Got bored and interested into the fact, of making a good looking Elf.
Vanilla is just a big no no... xD


[b]For the Dunmer you will need - Eyes of Aber & KSHairdos
for the Bosmer you will need - The eyes of the Beauty & KSHairdos
and for the Altmer you will need - Brows, Eyes of Aber & KSHairdos
[/b][/color][b][color=#ffffff]for the Orsimer you need Loks Eyes Standalone with and without glow[/color][/b]


[u][b][color=#b6d7a8]-Required-[/color][/b][/u]

[color=#ffffff]RaceMenu by Expired 
Eyes of Aber by Aberin (Altmer & Dunmer)
The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot as LogRaam (Bosmer)
Brows by Hvergelmir (Almer)
KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky (all 3 of them)
Loks Eyes Standalone with and without glow by Lokels (Orismer)[/color]

[u][b][color=#b6d7a8]-Highly Recommended-[/color][/b][/u]

[color=#ffffff]SAM - Shape Atlas for Men + HD Textures from vectorplexus.com
Fine Face - SAM bye urshi
Salt and Wind - Rough Hair for KS Hairdos by Jasper [/color]

[u][b][color=#b6d7a8]-Installation-[/color][/b][/u]

[color=#ffffff]With Nexus Mod Manager/Mod Organizer 
or manually in your data Folder[/color]

[b][u][color=#b6d7a8]-Credits-[/color][/u][/b]

[color=#ffffff]RaceMenu by Expired [/color]
[color=#ffffff]Eyes of Aber by Aberin[/color]

[color=#ffffff]-pikkatze for Smooth Faces for Ladies and Gents[/color]
[color=#ffffff]Salt and Wind - Rough Hair for KS Hairdos by Jasper [/color]
[color=#ffffff]KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky[/color]
[color=#ffffff]SAM - Shape Atlas for Men by Vector
[/color]Loks Eyes Standalone with and without glow by Lokels
[color=#ffffff]Skyrim by Bethesda[/color]
